string.text: This numeracy check helps you to assess your numeracy skills. You will get an indication on what you are capable of and what you can improve.
Get advice and tips on how to get better
Look through your answers in the test
You have assessed yourself on level 3 out of 3 in this check.
Numeracy skills on level 3 mean that you are able to understand and act on mathematical information embedded in various contexts and use your skills when required in daily life.
You have assessed yourself on level 2 out of 3 in this check.
Numeracy on level 2 mean that you are able to calculate in different situations, modify mathematical information and relate consciously to different mathematical operations.
You have assessed yourself on level 1 out of 3 levels in this check.
Numeracy skills on level 1 mean that you are able to use simple calculation in known situations and understand straightforward information with numbers.
